languages.text: "Надо же, как ты избирателен, старик! Когда ажи заводят тебя на охваченный Архиврагом мир, стоит быть признательным любой помощи — не только "глубокоуважаемых" господ".
"You are awfully choosy, old man! When the azhi lead you to a world captured by the Archenemy, you should be grateful for any help you receive — not just from 'deeply esteemed' gentlemen."
languages.original_text: "Надо же, как ты избирателен, старик! Когда ажи заводят тебя на охваченный Архиврагом мир, стоит быть признательным любой помощи — не только "глубокоуважаемых" господ".

traits.locale_text: "You are awfully choosy, old man! When the azhi lead you to a world captured by the Archenemy, you should be grateful for any help you receive — not just help from 'deeply esteemed' gentlemen."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You are awfully choosy, old man! When the azhi lead you to a world captured by the Archenemy, you should be grateful for any help you receive — not just help from 'deeply esteemed' gentlemen."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You are awfully choosy, old man! When the azhi lead you to a world captured by the Archenemy, you should be grateful for any help you receive — not just help from 'deeply esteemed' gentlemen."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You are awfully choosy, old man! When the azhi lead you to a world captured by the Archenemy, you should be grateful for any help you receive — not just help from 'deeply esteemed' gentlemen."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “你太挑剔了，老家伙！当鬼怪把你引到被混沌大敌占领的世界上时，无论谁愿意帮助你，你都应该表示感激——不仅仅是来自那些‘备受尊敬’的绅士们的帮助。”
languages.original_text: "You are awfully choosy, old man! When the azhi lead you to a world captured by the Archenemy, you should be grateful for any help you receive — not just from 'deeply esteemed' gentlemen."

traits.locale_text: “你太挑剔了，老家伙！当鬼怪把你引到被混沌大敌占领的世界上时，无论谁愿意帮助你，你都应该表示感激——不仅仅是来自那些‘备受尊敬’的绅士们的帮助。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Vous êtes un tantinet exigeant, vieillard ! Quand les azhi vous mènent à un monde sous l'influence du Grand Ennemi, il faut savoir se satisfaire de ce qu'on a sous le coude, et pas juste de l'aide d'honorables gentlemen, comme vous dites. »
languages.original_text: "You are awfully choosy, old man! When the azhi lead you to a world captured by the Archenemy, you should be grateful for any help you receive — not just from 'deeply esteemed' gentlemen."

traits.locale_text: « Vous êtes un tantinet exigeant, vieillard ! Quand les azhi vous mènent à un monde sous l'influence du Grand Ennemi, il faut savoir se satisfaire de ce qu'on a sous le coude, et pas juste de l'aide d'honorables gentlemen, comme vous dites. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «¡No seas tan exigente, anciano! Cuando los azhi te llevan a un mundo capturado por el Archienemigo, hay que agradecer toda la ayuda que se recibe, aunque no venga de un "estimado" caballero».
languages.original_text: "You are awfully choosy, old man! When the azhi lead you to a world captured by the Archenemy, you should be grateful for any help you receive — not just from 'deeply esteemed' gentlemen."

traits.locale_text: «¡No seas tan exigente, anciano! Cuando los azhi te llevan a un mundo capturado por el Archienemigo, hay que agradecer toda la ayuda que se recibe, aunque no venga de un "estimado" caballero».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「ずいぶんより好みをするのね、ご老人！悪魔が渾沌の勢力に占領された星に案内しようとも、受ける援助すべてに感謝すべきよ…『実に立派な』紳士に対してだけじゃなくて」
languages.original_text: "You are awfully choosy, old man! When the azhi lead you to a world captured by the Archenemy, you should be grateful for any help you receive — not just from 'deeply esteemed' gentlemen."

traits.locale_text: 「ずいぶんより好みをするのね、ご老人！悪魔が渾沌の勢力に占領された星に案内しようとも、受ける援助すべてに感謝すべきよ…”実に立派な”紳士に対してだけじゃなくて」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr seid ungeheuer wählerisch, alter Mann! Wenn die Azhi einen auf eine Welt führen, die vom Erzfeind erobert wurde, sollte man für jede Hilfe dankbar sein. Nicht nur für die von 'hochverehrten' Herren."
languages.original_text: "You are awfully choosy, old man! When the azhi lead you to a world captured by the Archenemy, you should be grateful for any help you receive — not just from 'deeply esteemed' gentlemen."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seid ungeheuer wählerisch, alter Mann! Wenn die Azhi einen auf eine Welt führen, die vom Erzfeind erobert wurde, sollte man für jede Hilfe dankbar sein. Nicht nur für die Hilfe von 'hochverehrten' Herren."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "You are awfully choosy, old man! When the azhi lead you to a world captured by the Archenemy, you should be grateful for any help you receive — not just help from 'deeply esteemed' gentlemen."

languages.text: "Sen de hiçbir şeyi beğenmiyorsun be ihtiyar! Şerbaşı'nın ele geçirdiği bir dünyaya düştüğünde yalnızca 'çok saygıdeğer beyefendilerden' gelene değil, her türlü yardıma minnet duyman gerekir."
languages.original_text: "You are awfully choosy, old man! When the azhi lead you to a world captured by the Archenemy, you should be grateful for any help you receive — not just from 'deeply esteemed' gentlemen."

traits.locale_text: "Sen de hiçbir şeyi beğenmiyorsun be ihtiyar! Şerbaşı'nın ele geçirdiği bir dünyaya düştüğünde yalnızca 'çok saygıdeğer beyefendilerden' gelene değil, her türlü yardıma minnet duyman gerekir."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
